item.description:
Lyman Orchards has enjoyed a great growing season. The warm weather has been perfect for growing corn, and the stalks will be towering well above your head.

This season's design honors the two year achievement of the UCONN Women's Baskeball Team!
78 Wins!
0 Defeats!
2 National Championships!

The UCONN Women's Baskeball Team has certainly put Connecticut on the map in the collegiate baskeball world! It was only fitting that a tribute has been maped out for them the cornfield!

If you have followed the UCONN Women's remarkable basketball journey over recent years, you'll love following the pathways through the 'corny' tribute to their a-MAZE-ing success. Even non-sports fans will find much to celebrate during maze season!

So c'mon out and attempt the maze. There are "corn cops" out there if you get lost...so don't fear! Enjoy the crisp autumn air...have a cup of cider. Enjoy this special time of the year.

Admission is $9.00 for adults. With the coupon in the link below, you can save $1.00. Here is the link for Lyman Orchards...

http://www.lymanorcha...

Also, I am hoping some will want to go out for a pizza afterward. So if you know a great place in the area...please share it with us. Let's have some autumn fun!!!!!!!!!!!!
item.how_to_find_us: Look for Terri or the Meetup Sign...
item.name: Lyman Orchards Corn Maze...
